price: ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߝߋ߲ ߓߍ߯ ߘߊߟߌ ߟߊߢߵߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߘߊ߲ߠߌ߲ ߖߎ߬ߕߍ߰ ߓߐ߱ ߘߐ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aḥsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabada-a khalqa al-insāni min ṭīnin
